user_query: I'm organizing a music trivia night and I need some interesting facts about the Billboard charts.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top 10 songs from the Billboard Hot 100 on the date 2022-03-15 along with their peak positions and weeks on chart.
Fetch the top 5 albums from the Billboard 200 on the date 2022-03-15 along with their peak positions and weeks on chart.
